info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:31PM EDT until July 20 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR MACOMB COUNTY... At 330 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Clair Shores, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Mount Clemens around 340 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Fraser, Eastpointe, Washington, New Haven, Center Line and Chesterfield Township. People attending Fraser Lions Club Carnival , and Jimmy Johns Field should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
